title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic Returning? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.24.20
description:
Get 20% off and free shipping by using the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Catch the games Saturdays at 2pm Pacific, Sundays at Noon Pacific and Monday night league at 5:30pm Pacific on http://Watch./LoLEsports.com  and  http://TWITCH.tv/LCS  and http://YouTube.com/LoLEsports

Blessing and Tim discuss the possibility of a sequel/remake of the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic games along with new GDC surveys and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:03:42 - Housekeeping
Our first impressions video of Kingdom Hearts 3 DLC Re: Mind is now up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
We've got FIVE community meet ups happening in the next few weeks -- Dallas/Fort Worth, Houston, NYC, DC, and Kansas City!
The Roper Report   -

00:39:56 - PlayStation has the highest customer brand loyalty according to one study
